plot: Ikkō Satonaka, a 16-year-old boy, is a first year trainee at the Saienji Buddhist Temple. He was sent there by his parents to be trained by his grandmother, the Saienji Priestess. At the temple he finds himself surrounded by beautiful female priestesses-in-training. Upon seeing a girl naked, Ikkō has the ability to turn into a super-monk, performing massive exorcisms for the good of the temple.
opening_theme: "Afurete Yuku no wa Kono Kimochi" (あふれてゆくのはこの気持ち) by Amae-taii!!
"Afureteyuku no wa Kono Kimochi" (あふれてゆくのはこの気持ち, That Which Overflows Are My Feelings) by Amae-tai!!
